snippet: Virtually every team in the N.F.L. relies on at least one receiver who is taller than 6 feet 1 inch.
lead_paragraph: Virtually every team in the N.F.L. relies on at least one receiver who is taller than 6 feet 1 inch.

headline.print_headline: Tall Receivers Are in Vogue, and They Cast a Shadow Over Most Defensive Backs
headline.main: Tall Receivers Are in Vogue, and They Cast a Shadow Over Most Defensive Backs
